page.title: 08EVENTS RAFFORD AREA
page.content: There is a fun day once a year.A bouncy castle is provided by show people.There are games such as pogo sticks and swingball and there is a swap shop. There are parties at Halloween and christmas at which there are raffles for adults.The parties are held in the hall.Food is provided by all the parents.There is a sports day in the summer among the activities are 3 legged races,egg and spoon races, skipping races and running races. There is also a treasure hunt in the park.Occasionally there are trips for children.Recently children and 2 adults visited Moray Firth Radio Station in a mini bus.
